meanings.definition: To change the color of something.
meanings.sent1: She recolors her drawings to make them more vibrant.
meanings.sent2: The artist recolors the walls of the gallery every year.
meanings.sent3: The magic paintbrush recolors everything it touches!
meanings.sent4: Her smile recolors the room with happiness.
meanings.sent5: The sunset recolors the sky in shades of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: Items that have been colored again.
meanings.sent1: The recolors of the furniture gave the room a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: She collected the recolors of the stamps for her collection.
meanings.sent3: The recolors of the toys made them look brand new.
meanings.sent4: His wardrobe was full of recolors of his favorite shirts.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with recolors of vibrant flowers.
